snippet: France was circulating a resolution to help restore order in the African country, which has plunged into deadly anarchy.
lead_paragraph: France was circulating a resolution to help restore order in the African country, which has plunged into deadly anarchy.
abstract: France formally circulates a Security Council resolution that would authorize thousands of African troops, aided by French soldiers, to restore order in the Central African Republic.

headline.main: U.N. Measure Would Send Forces to Aid Central African Republic
headline.print_headline: U.N. Measure Would Send Forces to Aid African State
